passive.name: PIX, FAERIE COMPANION
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) PIX, FAERIE COMPANION
                                Pix fires a barrage of 3 bolts that deal a total of 15 magic damage (15 (+6 ) + 15% ) at whatever Lulu attacks. These bolts can be blocked by other units.Pix can attach to other champions by casting some of Lulu's abilities, revealing them if they are an enemy or aiding their attacks instead of Lulu's if they are an ally.

q.name: (Q) GLITTERLANCE
q.description:
(Q) GLITTERLANCE
 7s   50/55/60/65 
                                
                                
                                Lulu and Pix each fire a piercing bolt that deals 50 magic damage (50/85/120/155 + 30% ) to the first enemy hit and 70% damage to additional enemies. Enemies hit are slowed by 80%, decaying over the next 2 seconds.

w.name: (W) WHIMSY
w.description:
(W) WHIMSY
 17/16/15/14s   65 
                                
                                
                                Pix creates a faerie ring, attaching to the first champion that enters for 5 seconds and casting an additional effect on them.On Allies: Grants 20% Movement Speed (20 + 5% ) and 25/30/35/40% Attack Speed for 3.5/4/4.5/5 seconds.On Enemies: Polymorphs the enemy for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75 seconds, disabling them from attacking or casting abilities and reducing their base Movement Speed to 60.Pix's ring will prioritize polymorphing enemies over speeding up allies.

e.name: (E) HELP, PIX!
e.description:
(E) HELP, PIX!
 10s   60/70/80/90 
                                
                                
                                Attaches Pix to target enemy or ally champion for 5 seconds.On Allies: Grants a shield that absorbs 60 damage (60/100/140/180 + 60% ) for 2.5 seconds.On Enemies: Deals 80 magic damage (80/120/160/200 + 40% ).

r.name: (R) WILD GROWTH
r.description:
(R) WILD GROWTH
 80/70/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Enlarges an ally champion, knocking nearby enemies into the air for 0.75 seconds. For the next 7 seconds, the ally champion grants 250 bonus Health (250/400/550 + 50% ) and slow nearby enemies by 30%.Activating a skill by touch applies it to Lulu.
